# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""

import datetime

from rest_framework import serializers

from client.models.credit_certificate import (
    CreditCertificate,
    CreditCertificateEnclosure,
    WorkFlowBusinessMap,
    WorkFlow,
    ReviewLog,
)
from consts.common import CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT
from utils.drf.fields import FenToYuanFloatField


#  融资父级信用凭证信息相关

[文档]class CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    内嵌序列器：融资信用凭证要件儿：
        - 获取
    """
    contract_amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    other_enclosure = serializers.ListField(
        child=serializers.JSONField(),
        allow_empty=True,
    )


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificateEnclosure
        fields = ('id', 'contract_no', 'contract_amount', 'contract_enclosure',
                  'contract_sign_at', 'invoice_enclosure', 'other_enclosure')
        read_only_fields = ('id', )




[文档]class CreditCertificateFinancingParentSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    父级转让凭证信息序列器
    """
    # 原始开立
    open_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")

    # 资金机构
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")

    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    balance_available = FenToYuanFloatField(source="net_amount")
    balance_outstanding = FenToYuanFloatField(source="balance")

    enclosures = CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(source='credit_certificate_enclosures', many=True)

    # 从原始授信信息获取融资费率
    interest_rate = serializers.FloatField(source="credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate")
    technical_service_rate = serializers.FloatField(source="credit.technical_service_rate")
    information_consultation_rate = serializers.FloatField(source="credit.information_consultation_rate")

    # 融资凭证的父级凭证的金额
    parent_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source='amount')
    parent_business = serializers.CharField(source='business.name')

    # 当前是父级信用凭证，不是需要的工作流数据
    work_flow = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_work_flow(self, instance):
        """
        返回融资流程第一步的工作流数据
        """
        flows = []
        business_flow = WorkFlowBusinessMap.objects.get(business__name="financing")
        complete_path = business_flow.end_work_flow.path + [business_flow.end_work_flow.code]
        node_objects = WorkFlow.objects.filter(code__in=complete_path).values_list("code", "title")
        node_dict = dict(node_objects)
        for i, v in enumerate(complete_path):
            done = True if i == 0 else False
            flows.append({"id": i + 1, "title": node_dict[v], "is_done": done})
        return flows



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('id', 'open_company', 'capital_company', 'balance_available', 'balance_outstanding',
                  'promise_pay_at', 'credit_number', 'work_flow', 'interest_rate', 'technical_service_rate',
                  'information_consultation_rate', 'enclosures',
                  'parent_amount', 'parent_business')
        read_only_fields = fields



# 融资信用凭证序列器

[文档]class CreditCertificateFinancingRetrieveSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    修改融资信用凭证信息时的序列器：
    """
    # 原始开立
    open_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")

    # 资金机构
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")

    credit_number = serializers.CharField(source="number")
    balance_available = FenToYuanFloatField(source="net_amount")
    balance_outstanding = FenToYuanFloatField(source="balance")

    # 从原始授信信息获取融资费率
    interest_rate = serializers.FloatField(source="credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate")
    financing_annualized_interest = FenToYuanFloatField(source="financeproject.financing_annualized_interest")

    technical_service_rate = serializers.FloatField(source="credit.technical_service_rate")
    technical_service = FenToYuanFloatField(source="financeproject.technical_service")

    information_consultation_rate = serializers.FloatField(source="credit.information_consultation_rate")
    information_consultation = FenToYuanFloatField(source="financeproject.information_consultation")

    # 融资凭证的父级凭证的金额
    parent_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source='parent_credit_certificate.amount')
    parent_business = serializers.CharField(source='parent_credit_certificate.business.name')

    # 当前融资凭证信息
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    enclosures = CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(source='parent_credit_certificate.credit_certificate_enclosures', many=True)
    work_flow = serializers.ListField(source="get_work_flow")


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('id', 'open_company', 'capital_company', 'balance_available', 'balance_outstanding', 'business', 'amount',
                  'promise_pay_at', 'credit_number', 'work_flow', 'interest_rate', 'financing_annualized_interest',
                  'technical_service_rate', 'technical_service', 'information_consultation_rate', 'information_consultation',
                  'enclosures', 'parent_amount', 'parent_business')
        read_only_fields = fields

#  融资详情页相关

[文档]class CreditCertificateNestedSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    内嵌序列器：
        - 获取信用凭证基本信息
    """
    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()
    deadline_close = serializers.SerializerMethodField()

    # 父级凭证的金额
    parent_amount = FenToYuanFloatField(source="parent_credit_certificate.amount")
    parent_business = serializers.CharField(source='parent_credit_certificate.business.name')


[文档]    def get_deadline_close(self, instance):
        today = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        if (instance.promise_pay_at - today).days <= CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT:
            return True
        return False



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('id', 'number', 'deadline_close', 'review_status', 'amount', 'is_valid',
                  'parent_amount', 'parent_business')
        read_only_fields = ('id', )




[文档]class CreditCertificateBasicInfoNestedSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    内嵌序列器：
        - 获取信用凭证相关信息
    """
    # 原始开立
    open_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.name")
    open_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source="credit.receive_company.credit_code")

    # 转让
    from_company = serializers.CharField(source="from_company.name", default="")
    from_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source="from_company.credit_code", default="")

    # 资金机构
    capital_company = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.name")
    capital_company_credit_code = serializers.CharField(source="credit.capital_company.credit_code")

    amount = FenToYuanFloatField()

    # 融资费用相关
    financing_annualized_interest_rate = serializers.FloatField(source="financeproject.financing_annualized_interest_rate")
    financing_annualized_interest = FenToYuanFloatField(source="financeproject.financing_annualized_interest")
    technical_service = FenToYuanFloatField(source="financeproject.technical_service")
    information_consultation = FenToYuanFloatField(source="financeproject.information_consultation")

    # 预计融资净额
    amount_available = FenToYuanFloatField(source="financeproject.financing_amount_available")

    # 申请日期
    apply_at = serializers.DateTimeField(source="updated_at")


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('open_company', 'open_company_credit_code', 'from_company', 'from_company_credit_code',
                  'capital_company', 'capital_company_credit_code', 'amount', 'financing_annualized_interest_rate',
                  'financing_annualized_interest', 'technical_service', 'information_consultation',
                  'amount_available', 'apply_at', 'promise_pay_at', )
        read_only_fields = ('id', )




[文档]class CreditCertificateRejectInfoNestedSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    内嵌序列器：
        - 获取驳回审批相关信息
    """
    reject_at = serializers.DateTimeField(source="review_at")
    reject_node = serializers.CharField(source="node")


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = ReviewLog
        fields = ('opinion', 'reject_at', 'reject_node',)
        read_only_fields = fields




[文档]class CreditCertificateDetailSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    融资信用凭证的详情信息：
        - 凭证基本信息
        - 信用凭证相关信息
        - 驳回审批相关信息
    """
    credit_certificate = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    basic_info = serializers.SerializerMethodField()
    enclosures = CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(
        source='parent_credit_certificate.credit_certificate_enclosures',
        many=True
    )
    reject_info = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_credit_certificate(self, instance):
        return CreditCertificateNestedSerializer(instance).data



[文档]    def get_basic_info(self, instance):
        return CreditCertificateBasicInfoNestedSerializer(instance).data



[文档]    def get_reject_info(self, instance):
        if instance.review_status == "reject":
            last_reject_review_log = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                data_table="credit_certificate",
                data_id=instance.id,
                result="reject",
            ).order_by('created_at').last()
            return CreditCertificateRejectInfoNestedSerializer(last_reject_review_log).data
        else:
            return None



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = ('credit_certificate', 'basic_info', 'enclosures', 'reject_info', )
        read_only_fields = ('id', )
